response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just a tool; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and capabilities that will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors.

Valued at $1,200,000, this product represents a unique investment that promises substantial returns on your investment. I am offering you the chance to own this extraordinary product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence.

Please consider this proposal carefully. I believe that with its exceptional value and potential, this product will be a valuable addition to your business or personal portfolio. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for considering this exceptional opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
